09-12-2024: - Added {{ItemIcon|Item=Rebirth|Size=20}} Rebirth channel and revive sounds
- Soul {{ItemIcon|Item=Rebirth|Size=20}} Rebirth: No longer grants 20% Weapon Damage
- Soul {{ItemIcon|Item=Rebirth|Size=20}} Rebirth: Cooldown Reduction reduced from 18% to 15%
08-29-2024: - Soul {{ItemIcon|Item=Rebirth|Size=20}} Rebirth: Cooldown reduction increased from +15% to +18%
- Soul {{ItemIcon|Item=Rebirth|Size=20}} Rebirth: Fixed being able to purchase globally during its brief respawn period
- Soul {{ItemIcon|Item=Rebirth|Size=20}} Rebirth: Fixed the camera moving away from the player if you will respawn, rather than following the ragdoll
08-15-2024: - Soul {{ItemIcon|Item=Rebirth|Size=20}} Rebirth: {{ItemIcon|Item=Rebirth|Size=20}} Rebirth Health increased from 40% to 50%
- Soul {{ItemIcon|Item=Rebirth|Size=20}} Rebirth: Cooldown reduced from 240s to 200s
08-01-2024: - Soul {{ItemIcon|Item=Rebirth|Size=20}} Rebirth: Cooldown reduction increased from 10% to 15%
07-18-2024: - Soul {{ItemIcon|Item=Rebirth|Size=20}} Rebirth (new T4 Vitality item): After you die, you will respawn in 4 seconds where you died with 40% of your Max Health. Cooldown: 220s. Also innately grants +20% Weapon Damage and +10% Cooldown Reduction.
